subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Derick Brassard scored 32 seconds into overtime, ending a 14-game streak without a goal, to lift the Rangers to a 1-0 win over the host Chicago Blackhawks.
snippet: Derick Brassard scored 32 seconds into overtime, ending a 14-game streak without a goal, to lift the Rangers to a 1-0 win over the host Chicago Blackhawks.
